verses.text: Save me, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w by|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* name, \w by|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* power secure \w for|strong="H1732"\w* me justice.

Listen, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer, attend \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* words \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* mouth.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* proud \w men|strong="H8034"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* risen against \w me|strong="H3467"\w*, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* terrible \w men|strong="H8034"\w* seek \w my|strong="H3467"\w* life, \w men|strong="H8034"\w* \w who|strong="H3467"\w* do \w not|strong="H3467"\w* set God before \w them|strong="H3467"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
\w But|strong="H8085"\w* see! God \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* helper, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* sustaining \w my|strong="H8085"\w* life.

\w Let|strong="H7760"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* evil fall back \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* foes: cut \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* faithfulness, \nd Lord\nd*.
\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* bring \w you|strong="H5315"\w* glad sacrifice, praising \w your|strong="H2009"\w* gracious name;

\w for|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w distress|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H7451"\w* saved \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* feasted \w my|strong="H7725"\w* eyes \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* foes.
